import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { faPython, faCss3, faGitAlt, faHtml5, faJsSquare, faReact, } from '@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons' import Loader from 'react-loaders' import AnimatedLetters from '../AnimatedLetters' import { FontAwesomeIcon } from '@fortawesome/react-fontawesome' import './index.scss' const About = () => { const [letterClass, setLetterClass] = useState('text-animate') useEffect(() => { const timer = setTimeout(() => { setLetterClass('text-animate-hover'); }, 3000); // Cleanup function to clear the timeout return () => clearTimeout(timer); }, []); return ( <>

I'm a very ambitious software developer looking for a role in an established IT company with the opportunity to work with the latest technologies on challenging and diverse projects.

I'm quiet confident, naturally curious, and perpetually working on improving my chops one design problem at a time.

If I need to define myself in one sentence that would be a family person, a sports fanatic, ,quick learner, photography enthusiast, and tech-obsessed!!!

) } export default About
